game.name: Chiggy Pigg & The Great Drought
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A non-linear sci-fi adventure featuring cute desert themed characters. Restore life to world and get to know the people within it. There are plenty of mysteries to discover along the way.
